definition.name: Brave Search
definition.description: Private web search using Brave's API.
definition.toolDefinition: {"name": "searchWeb", "description": "Search the web for a given query", "parameters": { "type": "object", "properties": { "q": { "type": "string", "description": "The search query" }, "count": { "type": "integer", "description": "Number of results (1-20)" } }, "required": ["q"] } }

definition.name: Hacker News
definition.description: Get the latest top stories from Hacker News (via HNPWA API for better JSON structure).

definition.name: OMDb Movies
definition.toolDefinition: {"name": "searchMovie", "description": "Search for a movie title", "parameters": { "type": "object", "properties": { "t": { "type": "string", "description": "Movie title" }, "y": { "type": "string", "description": "Year of release (optional)" } }, "required": ["t"] } }

skills.author: ddutchie
skills.description: Get a summary of the most important news today.

definition.name: Daily News Briefing
definition.prompt: Use the `searchWeb` tool to find the top news headlines for today. Summarize the 5 most important stories into a concise briefing.

skills.author: ddutchie
skills.description: Find details about a specific movie.

definition.name: Movie Night Scout
definition.prompt: Search OMDb for the movie 'Dune'. If found, provide the plot summary, IMDB rating, and release year. Then tell me if it's considered a good sci-fi movie.

skills.author: ddutchie
skills.description: Get a summary of the latest top tech stories.

definition.name: Tech Briefing
definition.prompt: Get the top stories from Hacker News using the `getTopStories` tool. Summarize the top 5 with a catchy headline and a 1-sentence description for each.

skills.author: ddutchie
skills.description: A test skill to verify the auto-generate manifest workflow.

definition.name: Test Workflow Skill
definition.prompt: This is a test skill. Just say hello.

definition.name: Fetch
definition.description: Fetches web content and converts to markdown.

definition.name: Sequential Thinking
definition.description: A tool for dynamic, step-by-step problem solving.

definition.name: Time
definition.description: Provides time and timezone conversion tools.
